title: Taliyah w
body: I think its would be cool if Taliyah stand on her w and then  jumping like ziggs, because why can she do that on other champions  and dont under her self shes standing too on earth :D{{champion:163}}

replies.body: This was addressed by a rioter before. They said that they wanted the skill to be used offensively, instead of being saved as an escape. I think it actually tested with the ability to do this, but decided to scrap it due to the aforementioned reason.
